11117: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11118: 
11119: %% Create several acceptor processes (processes that calls socket:accept/1)
11120: %% and then a couple of clients connects to them without any problems.
11121: %% TCP, IPv4.
11122: otp16359_maccept_tcp4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
11123:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
11124:     tc_try(otp16359_maccept_tcp4,
11125:            fun() -> has_support_ipv4() end,
11126:            fun() ->
11127:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet,
11128:                                  protocol => tcp},
11129:                    ok = otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState)
11130:            end).
11131: 
11132: 
11133: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11134: 
11135: %% Create several acceptor processes (processes that calls socket:accept/1)
11136: %% and then a couple of clients connects to them without any problems.
11137: %% TCP, IPv6.
11138: otp16359_maccept_tcp6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
11139:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
11140:     tc_try(otp16359_maccept_tcp6,
11141:            fun() -> has_support_ipv6() end,
11142:            fun() ->
11143:                    InitState = #{domain   => inet6,
11144:                                  protocol => tcp},
11145:                    ok = otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState)
11146:            end).
11147: 
11148: 
11149: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11150: 
11151: %% Create several acceptor processes (processes that calls socket:accept/1)
11152: %% and then a couple of clients connects to them without any problems.
11153: %% TCP, UNix Domain Sockets.
11154: otp16359_maccept_tcpL(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
11155:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
11156:     tc_try(otp16359_maccept_tcpL,
11157:            fun() -> has_support_unix_domain_socket() end,
11158:            fun() ->
11159:                    InitState = #{domain   => local,
11160:                                  protocol => default},
11161:                    ok = otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState)
11162:            end).
11163: 
11164: 
11165: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
11166: 
11167: otp16359_maccept_tcp(InitState) ->
11168:     PrimAcceptorSeq =
11169:         [
11170:          %% *** Init part ***
11171:          #{desc => "await start",
11172:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11173:                            Tester = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11174:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester}}
11175:                    end},
11176:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11177:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Pid} = _State) ->
11178:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11179:                            ok
11180:                    end},
11181:          #{desc => "which local address",
11182:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := Domain} = State) ->
11183:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11184:                            ?SEV_IPRINT("LSA: ~p", [LSA]),
11185:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA}}
11186:                    end},
11187:          #{desc => "create (listen) socket",
11188:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
11189:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
11190:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
11191:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11192:                                    {ok, State#{lsock => Sock}};
11193:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11194:                                    ERROR
11195:                            end
11196:                    end},
11197:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
11198:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
11199:                          lsock  := LSock,
11200:                          lsa    := LSA} = _State) ->
11201:                            case socket:bind(LSock, LSA) of
11202:                                ok ->
11203:                                    ok; % We do not care about the port for local
11204:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11205:                                    ERROR
11206:                            end;
11207:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lsa := LSA} = State) ->
11208:                            case sock_bind(LSock, LSA) of
11209:                                ok ->
11210:                                    Port = sock_port(LSock),
11211:                                    {ok, State#{lport => Port}};
11212:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11213:                                    ERROR
11214:                            end
11215:                    end},
11216:          #{desc => "make listen socket",
11217:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock}) ->
11218:                            socket:listen(LSock)
11219:                    end},
11220:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11221:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
11222:                          tester := Tester,
11223:                          lsock  := LSock,
11224:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}}) ->
11225:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, {LSock, Path}),
11226:                            ok;
11227:                       (#{lsock := LSock, lport := LPort, tester := Tester}) ->
11228:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init, {LSock, LPort}),
11229:                            ok
11230:                    end},
11231: 
11232:          %% *** The actual test ***
11233:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
11234:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11235:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
11236:                    end},
11237:          #{desc => "attempt to accept (with success)",
11238:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
11239:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
11240:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11241:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected (accept) success: "
11242:                                                "~n   ~p", [Sock]),
11243:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
11244:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11245:                                    ERROR
11246:                            end
11247:                    end},
11248:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
11249:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11250:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
11251:                            ok
11252:                    end},
11253: 
11254:          %% *** Terminate ***
11255:          #{desc => "await terminate",
11256:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11257:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester),
11258:                            ok
11259:                    end},
11260:          %% *** Close (connect) socket ***
11261:          #{desc => "close (connect) socket",
11262:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11263:                            sock_close(Sock),
11264:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11265:                    end},
11266:          %% *** Close (listen) socket ***
11267:          #{desc => "close (listen) socket",
11268:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
11269:                          lsock  := Sock,
11270:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
11271:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
11272:                            State1 =
11273:                                unlink_path(Path,
11274:                                            fun() ->
11275:                                                    maps:remove(lsa, State)
11276:                                            end,
11277:                                            fun() -> State end),
11278:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State1)};
11279:                       (#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
11280:                            sock_close(LSock),
11281:                            {ok, maps:remove(lsock, State)}
11282:                    end},
11283: 
11284:          %% *** We are done ***
11285:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11286:         ],
11287: 
11288:     SecAcceptorSeq =
11289:         [
11290:          %% *** Init part ***
11291:          #{desc => "await start",
11292:            cmd  => fun(State) ->
11293:                            {Tester, LSock} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11294:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester,
11295:                                        lsock  => LSock}}
11296:                            
11297:                    end},
11298:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11299:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Pid} = _State) ->
11300:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11301:                            ok
11302:                    end},
11303:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11304:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11305:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
11306:                            ok
11307:                    end},
11308: 
11309:          %% *** The actual test part ***
11310:          #{desc => "await continue (accept)",
11311:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11312:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, accept)
11313:                    end},
11314:          #{desc => "attempt to accept",
11315:            cmd  => fun(#{lsock := LSock} = State) ->
11316:                            case socket:accept(LSock) of
11317:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11318:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("Expected (accept) success: "
11319:                                                "~n   ~p", [Sock]),
11320:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
11321:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11322:                                    ERROR
11323:                            end
11324:                    end},
11325:          #{desc => "announce ready (accept)",
11326:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11327:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, accept),
11328:                            ok
11329:                    end},
11330: 
11331:          %% *** Terminate ***
11332:          #{desc => "await terminate",
11333:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11334:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11335:                                ok ->
11336:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
11337:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11338:                                    ERROR
11339:                            end
11340:                    end},
11341:          %% *** Close (connect) socket ***
11342:          #{desc => "close (connect) socket",
11343:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11344:                            sock_close(Sock),
11345:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11346:                    end},
11347: 
11348:          %% *** We are done ***
11349:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11350:         ],
11351: 
11352:     ClientSeq =
11353:         [
11354:          %% *** Wait for start order ***
11355:          #{desc => "await start (from tester)",
11356:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local} = State) ->
11357:                            {Tester, Path} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11358:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_path => Path}};
11359:                       (State) ->
11360:                            {Tester, Port} = ?SEV_AWAIT_START(),
11361:                            {ok, State#{tester => Tester, server_port => Port}}
11362:                    end},
11363:          #{desc => "monitor tester",
11364:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11365:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Tester),
11366:                            ok
11367:                    end},
11368: 
11369:          %% *** The init part ***
11370:          #{desc => "which server (local) address",
11371:            cmd  => fun(#{domain      := local = Domain,
11372:                          server_path := Path} = State) ->
11373:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11374:                            SSA = #{family => Domain, path => Path},
11375:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}};
11376:                       (#{domain := Domain, server_port := Port} = State) ->
11377:                            LSA = which_local_socket_addr(Domain),
11378:                            SSA = LSA#{port => Port},
11379:                            {ok, State#{lsa => LSA, server_sa => SSA}}
11380:                    end},
11381:          #{desc => "create socket",
11382:            cmd  => fun(#{domain   := Domain,
11383:                          protocol := Proto} = State) ->
11384:                            case socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto) of
11385:                                {ok, Sock} ->
11386:                                    {ok, State#{sock => Sock}};
11387:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11388:                                    ERROR
11389:                            end
11390:                    end},
11391:          #{desc => "bind to local address",
11392:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, lsa := LSA} = _State) ->
11393:                            case sock_bind(Sock, LSA) of
11394:                                ok ->
11395:                                    ok;
11396:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11397:                                    ERROR
11398:                            end
11399:                    end},
11400:          #{desc => "announce ready (init)",
11401:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11402:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, init),
11403:                            ok
11404:                    end},
11405: 
11406:          %% *** The actual test ***
11407:          #{desc => "await continue (connect)",
11408:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = _State) ->
11409:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_CONTINUE(Tester, tester, connect)
11410:                    end},
11411:          #{desc => "connect to server",
11412:            cmd  => fun(#{sock := Sock, server_sa := SSA}) ->
11413:                            case socket:connect(Sock, SSA) of
11414:                                ok ->
11415:                                    ?SEV_IPRINT("connected", []),
11416:                                    ok;
11417:                                {error, Reason} = ERROR ->
11418:                                    ?SEV_EPRINT("failed connect: "
11419:                                                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
11420:                                    ERROR
11421:                            end
11422:                    end},
11423:          #{desc => "announce ready (connect)",
11424:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester}) ->
11425:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_READY(Tester, connect),
11426:                            ok
11427:                    end},
11428: 
11429:          %% *** Termination ***
11430:          #{desc => "await terminate",
11431:            cmd  => fun(#{tester := Tester} = State) ->
11432:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATE(Tester, tester) of
11433:                                ok ->
11434:                                    {ok, maps:remove(tester, State)};
11435:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11436:                                    ERROR
11437:                            end
11438:                    end},
11439:          #{desc => "close socket",
11440:            cmd  => fun(#{domain := local,
11441:                          sock   := Sock,
11442:                          lsa    := #{path := Path}} = State) ->
11443:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
11444:                            State1 =
11445:                                unlink_path(Path,
11446:                                            fun() ->
11447:                                                    maps:remove(lsa, State)
11448:                                            end,
11449:                                            fun() -> State end),
11450:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State1)};
11451:                       (#{sock := Sock} = State) ->
11452:                            ok = socket:close(Sock),
11453:                            {ok, maps:remove(sock, State)}
11454:                    end},
11455: 
11456:          %% *** We are done ***
11457:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11458:         ],
11459: 
11460:     TesterSeq =
11461:         [
11462:          %% Init part
11463:          #{desc => "monitor prim-acceptor",
11464:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
11465:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11466:                            ok
11467:                    end},
11468:          #{desc => "monitor sec-acceptor 1",
11469:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11470:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11471:                            ok
11472:                    end},
11473:          #{desc => "monitor sec-acceptor 2",
11474:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11475:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11476:                            ok
11477:                    end},
11478:          #{desc => "monitor client 1",
11479:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11480:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11481:                            ok
11482:                    end},
11483:          #{desc => "monitor client 2",
11484:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11485:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11486:                            ok
11487:                    end},
11488:          #{desc => "monitor client 3",
11489:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
11490:                            _MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
11491:                            ok
11492:                    end},
11493: 
11494: 
11495:          %% Start the prim-acceptor
11496:          #{desc => "start prim-acceptor",
11497:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
11498:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid),
11499:                            ok
11500:                    end},
11501:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor ready (init)",
11502:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
11503:                            {ok, {Sock, Port}} =
11504:                                ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_acceptor, init),
11505:                            {ok, State#{lsock => Sock, lport => Port}}
11506:                    end},
11507: 
11508:          %% Start sec-acceptor-1
11509:          #{desc => "start sec-acceptor 1",
11510:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid, lsock := LSock} = _State) ->
11511:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LSock),
11512:                            ok
11513:                    end},
11514:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 ready (init)",
11515:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11516:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor1, init)
11517:                    end},
11518: 
11519:          %% Start sec-acceptor-2
11520:          #{desc => "start sec-acceptor 2",
11521:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid, lsock := LSock} = _State) ->
11522:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LSock),
11523:                            ok
11524:                    end},
11525:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 ready (init)",
11526:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11527:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor2, init)
11528:                    end},
11529: 
11530:          %% Start client-1
11531:          #{desc => "start client 1",
11532:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid, lport := LPort} = _State) ->
11533:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LPort),
11534:                            ok
11535:                    end},
11536:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (init)",
11537:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11538:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, init)
11539:                    end},
11540: 
11541:          %% Start client-2
11542:          #{desc => "start client 2",
11543:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid, lport := LPort} = _State) ->
11544:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LPort),
11545:                            ok
11546:                    end},
11547:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (init)",
11548:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11549:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, init)
11550:                    end},
11551: 
11552:          %% Start client-3
11553:          #{desc => "start client 3",
11554:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid, lport := LPort} = _State) ->
11555:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_START(Pid, LPort),
11556:                            ok
11557:                    end},
11558:          #{desc => "await client 3 ready (init)",
11559:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
11560:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, init)
11561:                    end},
11562: 
11563:          %% Activate the acceptor(s)
11564:          #{desc => "active prim-acceptor",
11565:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
11566:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
11567:                            ok
11568:                    end},
11569:          #{desc => "active sec-acceptor 1",
11570:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11571:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
11572:                            ok
11573:                    end},
11574:          #{desc => "active sec-acceptor 2",
11575:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11576:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, accept),
11577:                            ok
11578:                    end},
11579: 
11580:          ?SEV_SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
11581: 
11582:          %% Activate the client(s)
11583:          #{desc => "active client 1",
11584:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11585:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
11586:                            ok
11587:                    end},
11588: 
11589:          ?SEV_SLEEP(100),
11590: 
11591:          #{desc => "active client 2",
11592:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11593:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
11594:                            ok
11595:                    end},
11596: 
11597:          ?SEV_SLEEP(100),
11598: 
11599:          #{desc => "active client 3",
11600:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
11601:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_CONTINUE(Pid, connect),
11602:                            ok
11603:                    end},
11604: 
11605:          %% Await acceptor(s) completions
11606:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor ready (accept)",
11607:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
11608:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, prim_acceptor, accept)
11609:                    end},
11610:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 ready (accept)",
11611:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11612:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor1, accept)
11613:                    end},
11614:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 ready (accept)",
11615:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11616:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, sec_acceptor2, accept)
11617:                    end},
11618:          #{desc => "await client 1 ready (connect)",
11619:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11620:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client1, connect)
11621:                    end},
11622:          #{desc => "await client 2 ready (connect)",
11623:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11624:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client2, connect)
11625:                    end},
11626:          #{desc => "await client 3 ready (connect)",
11627:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
11628:                            ?SEV_AWAIT_READY(Pid, client3, connect)
11629:                    end},
11630: 
11631:          %% Terminate
11632:          #{desc => "order client 1 to terminate",
11633:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11634:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11635:                            ok
11636:                    end},
11637:          #{desc => "await client 1 termination",
11638:            cmd  => fun(#{client1 := Pid} = State) ->
11639:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11640:                                ok ->
11641:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client1, State),
11642:                                    {ok, State1};
11643:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11644:                                    ERROR
11645:                            end
11646:                    end},
11647:          #{desc => "order client 2 to terminate",
11648:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11649:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11650:                            ok
11651:                    end},
11652:          #{desc => "await client 2 termination",
11653:            cmd  => fun(#{client2 := Pid} = State) ->
11654:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11655:                                ok ->
11656:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client2, State),
11657:                                    {ok, State1};
11658:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11659:                                    ERROR
11660:                            end
11661:                    end},
11662:          #{desc => "order client 3 to terminate",
11663:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = _State) ->
11664:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11665:                            ok
11666:                    end},
11667:          #{desc => "await client 3 termination",
11668:            cmd  => fun(#{client3 := Pid} = State) ->
11669:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11670:                                ok ->
11671:                                    State1 = maps:remove(client3, State),
11672:                                    {ok, State1};
11673:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11674:                                    ERROR
11675:                            end
11676:                    end},
11677:          #{desc => "order prim-acceptor to terminate",
11678:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = _State) ->
11679:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11680:                            ok
11681:                    end},
11682:          #{desc => "await prim-acceptor termination",
11683:            cmd  => fun(#{prim_acceptor := Pid} = State) ->
11684:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11685:                                ok ->
11686:                                    State1 = maps:remove(prim_acceptor, State),
11687:                                    {ok, State1};
11688:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11689:                                    ERROR
11690:                            end
11691:                    end},
11692:          #{desc => "order sec-acceptor 1 to terminate",
11693:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = _State) ->
11694:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11695:                            ok
11696:                    end},
11697:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 1 termination",
11698:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor1 := Pid} = State) ->
11699:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11700:                                ok ->
11701:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sec_acceptor1, State),
11702:                                    {ok, State1};
11703:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11704:                                    ERROR
11705:                            end
11706:                    end},
11707:          #{desc => "order sec-acceptor 2 to terminate",
11708:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = _State) ->
11709:                            ?SEV_ANNOUNCE_TERMINATE(Pid),
11710:                            ok
11711:                    end},
11712:          #{desc => "await sec-acceptor 2 termination",
11713:            cmd  => fun(#{sec_acceptor2 := Pid} = State) ->
11714:                            case ?SEV_AWAIT_TERMINATION(Pid) of
11715:                                ok ->
11716:                                    State1 = maps:remove(sec_acceptor2, State),
11717:                                    {ok, State1};
11718:                                {error, _} = ERROR ->
11719:                                    ERROR
11720:                            end
11721:                    end},
11722:          
11723:          %% *** We are done ***
11724:          ?SEV_FINISH_NORMAL
11725:         ],
11726: 
11727: 
11728: 
11729:     i("create prim-acceptor evaluator"),
11730:     PrimAInitState = InitState,
11731:     PrimAcceptor = ?SEV_START("prim-acceptor", PrimAcceptorSeq, PrimAInitState),
11732: 
11733:     i("create sec-acceptor 1 evaluator"),
11734:     SecAInitState1 = maps:remove(domain, InitState),
11735:     SecAcceptor1 = ?SEV_START("sec-acceptor-1", SecAcceptorSeq, SecAInitState1),
11736: 
11737:     i("create sec-acceptor 2 evaluator"),
11738:     SecAInitState2 = SecAInitState1,
11739:     SecAcceptor2 = ?SEV_START("sec-acceptor-2", SecAcceptorSeq, SecAInitState2),
11740: 
11741:     i("create client 1 evaluator"),
11742:     ClientInitState1 = InitState,
11743:     Client1 = ?SEV_START("client-1", ClientSeq, ClientInitState1),
11744: 
11745:     i("create client 2 evaluator"),
11746:     ClientInitState2 = InitState,
11747:     Client2 = ?SEV_START("client-2", ClientSeq, ClientInitState2),
11748: 
11749:     i("create client 3 evaluator"),
11750:     ClientInitState3 = InitState,
11751:     Client3 = ?SEV_START("client-3", ClientSeq, ClientInitState3),
11752: 
11753:     i("create tester evaluator"),
11754:     TesterInitState = #{prim_acceptor => PrimAcceptor#ev.pid,
11755:                         sec_acceptor1 => SecAcceptor1#ev.pid,
11756:                         sec_acceptor2 => SecAcceptor2#ev.pid,
11757:                         client1       => Client1#ev.pid,
11758:                         client2       => Client2#ev.pid,
11759:                         client3       => Client3#ev.pid},
11760:     Tester = ?SEV_START("tester", TesterSeq, TesterInitState),
11761: 
11762:     i("await evaluator(s)"),
11763:     ok = ?SEV_AWAIT_FINISH([PrimAcceptor, SecAcceptor1, SecAcceptor2,
11764:                             Client1, Client2, Client3,
11765:                             Tester]).
11766:

11777:                                  protocol  => tcp,

11780:            end).

11799: 
11800: otp18240_accept_tcp(#{domain    := Domain,
11801:                       protocol  := Proto,
11802:                       num_socks := NumSocks}) ->
11803:     Self = self(),
11804:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
11805:                                        otp18240_acceptor(Self,
11806:                                                          Domain, Proto,
11807:                                                          NumSocks)
11808:                                end),
11809:     otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon).
11810: 
11811: otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon) ->
11812:     receive
11813: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, ok} ->
11814: 	    i("acceptor successfully terminated"),
11815:             ok;
11816: 	{'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
11817: 	    i("acceptor successfully terminated"),
11818:             exit(SKIP);
11819:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Info} ->
11820:             i("acceptor unexpected termination: "
11821:               "~n   ~p", [Info]),
11822:             exit({unexpected_result, Info})
11823:     after 5000 ->
11824: 	    i("acceptor process (~p) info"
11825: 	      "~n   Refs: ~p"
11826: 	      "~n   Info: ~p",
11827: 	      [Pid, monitored_by(Pid), erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
11828: 	    otp18240_await_acceptor(Pid, Mon)
11829:     end.
11830: 
11831: otp18240_acceptor(Parent, Domain, Proto, NumSocks) ->
11832:     i("[acceptor] begin with: "
11833:       "~n   Parent:   ~p"
11834:       "~n   Domain:   ~p"
11835:       "~n   Protocol: ~p", [Parent, Domain, Proto]),
11836:     MonitoredBy0 = monitored_by(),
11837:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
11838:     Addr = case ?SLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
11839:                {ok, #{addr := A}} ->
11840:                    A;
11841:                {error, Reason} ->
11842:                    exit({skip, Reason})
11843:            end,
11844:     {ok, LSock} = socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto,
11845:                               #{use_registry => false}),
11846:     ok = socket:bind(LSock, #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => 0}),
11847:     ok = socket:listen(LSock, NumSocks),
11848:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(5)),
11849:     MonitoredBy1 = monitored_by(),
11850:     i("[acceptor]: listen socket created"
11851:       "~n   'Montored By' before listen socket: ~p"
11852:       "~n   'Montored By' after listen socket:  ~p",
11853:       [MonitoredBy0, MonitoredBy1]),
11854: 
11855:     [LSockMon] = MonitoredBy1 -- MonitoredBy0,
11856: 
11857:     i("[acceptor]: "
11858:       "~n   Listen Socket Monitor: ~p"
11859:       "~n   Listen Socket info:    ~p",
11860:       [LSockMon, socket:info(LSock)]),
11861: 
11862:     {ok, #{port := Port}} = socket:sockname(LSock),
11863: 
11864:     i("[acceptor] create ~w clients (connectors)", [NumSocks]),
11865:     _Clients = [spawn_link(fun() ->
11866:                                    otp18240_client(CID,
11867:                                                    Domain, Proto,
11868:                                                    Addr, Port)
11869:                            end) || CID <- lists:seq(1, NumSocks)],
11870: 
11871:     i("[acceptor] accept ~w connections", [NumSocks]),
11872:     ServSocks = [otp18240_do_accept(AID, LSock) ||
11873:                     AID <- lists:seq(1, NumSocks)],
11874: 
11875:     i("[acceptor] close accepted connections when: "
11876:       "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p", [socket:info(LSock)]),
11877:     _ = [otp18240_do_close(S) || S <- ServSocks],
11878: 
11879:     %% at this point in time there should be no monitors from NIFs,
11880:     %% because we're not accepting anything
11881:     i("[acceptor] check monitor status"),
11882:     MonitoredBy2 = monitored_by(),
11883:     MonitoredBy3 = MonitoredBy2 -- [Parent, LSockMon],
11884:     i("[acceptor] monitor status: "
11885:       "~n   UnRefs:       ~p"
11886:       "~n   MonitoredBy2: ~p"
11887:       "~n   MonitoredBy3: ~p",
11888:       [[Parent, LSockMon], MonitoredBy2, MonitoredBy3]),
11889:     if
11890:         ([] =:= MonitoredBy3) ->
11891:             i("[acceptor] done"),
11892:             socket:close(LSock),
11893:             exit(ok);
11894:         true ->
11895:             socket:close(LSock),
11896:             i("[acceptor] Unexpected monitors: "
11897:               "~n   ~p", [MonitoredBy2]),
11898:             exit({unexpected_monitors, MonitoredBy2})
11899:     end.
11900: 
11901: 
11902: otp18240_client(ID, Domain, Proto, Addr, PortNo) ->
11903:     i("[connector ~w] try create connector socket", [ID]),
11904:     {ok, Sock} = socket:open(Domain, stream, Proto, #{use_registry => false}),
11905:     ok = socket:bind(Sock, #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => 0}),
11906:     %% ok = socket:setopt(Sock, otp, debug, true),
11907:     i("[connector ~w] try connect", [ID]),
11908:     case socket:connect(Sock,
11909:                         #{family => Domain, addr => Addr, port => PortNo}) of
11910:         ok ->
11911:             i("[connector ~w] connected - now try recv", [ID]),
11912:             case socket:recv(Sock) of
11913:                 {ok, Data} ->
11914:                     i("[connector ~w] received unexpected data: "
11915:                       "~n   ~p", [ID, Data]),
11916:                     (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11917:                     exit('unexpected data');
11918:                 {error, closed} ->
11919:                     i("[connector ~w] expected socket close", [ID]);
11920:                 {error, Reason} ->
11921:                     i("[connector ~w] unexpected error when reading: "
11922:                       "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11923:                     (catch socket:close(Sock))
11924:             end;
11925:         {error, {completion_status, #{info := invalid_netname = R} = Reason}} ->
11926:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11927:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11928:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11929:             exit({skip, R});
11930:         {error, {completion_status, invalid_netname = Reason}} ->
11931:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11932:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11933:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11934:             exit({skip, Reason});
11935:         {error, enetunreach = Reason} ->
11936:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11937:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11938:             (catch socket:close(Sock)),
11939:             exit({skip, Reason});
11940: 
11941:         {error, Reason} ->
11942:             i("[connector ~w] failed connecting: "
11943:               "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11944:             (catch socket:close(Sock))
11945:     end,
11946:     i("[connector ~w] done", [ID]),
11947:     ok.
11948: 
11949: 
11950: otp18240_do_accept(ID, LSock) ->
11951:     i("[acceptor ~w] try accept", [ID]),
11952:     {ok, Sock} = socket:accept(LSock),
11953:     i("[acceptor ~w] accepted: ~p", [ID, Sock]),
11954:     {ID, Sock}.
11955: 
11956: 
11957: otp18240_do_close({ID, Sock}) ->
11958:     i("[acceptor ~w] try close ~p", [ID, Sock]),
11959:     case socket:close(Sock) of
11960: 	ok ->
11961: 	    i("[acceptor ~w] socket closed", [ID]),
11962: 	    ok;
11963: 	{error, Reason} ->
11964: 	    i("[acceptor ~w] failed close socket: "
11965: 	      "~n   ~p", [ID, Reason]),
11966: 	    error
11967:     end.
11968: 
11969: 
11970:

11972: 
11973: %% This test case is to verify that we do not leak monitors.
11974: otp18635(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
11975:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
11976:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
11977:            fun() ->
11978:                    is_not_windows(),
11979:                    has_support_ipv4()
11980:            end,
11981:            fun() ->
11982:                    InitState = #{},
11983:                    ok = do_otp18635(InitState)
11984:            end).
11985: 
11986: 
11987: do_otp18635(_) ->
11988:     Parent = self(),
11989: 
11990:     ?P("try create (listen) socket when"
11991:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
11992:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
11993:        [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
11994: 
11995:     ?P("Get \"proper\" local socket address"),
11996:     LSA = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
11997: 
11998:     {ok, LSock} = socket:open(inet, stream, #{use_registry => true}),
11999: 
12000:     ?P("bind (listen) socket to: "
12001:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12002:     ok = socket:bind(LSock, LSA),
12003: 
12004:     ?P("make listen socket"),
12005:     ok = socket:listen(LSock),
12006: 
12007:     ?P("get sockname for listen socket"),
12008:     {ok, SA} = socket:sockname(LSock),
12009: 
12010:     %% ok = socket:setopt(LSock, otp, debug, true),
12011: 
12012:     % show handle returned from nowait accept
12013:     ?P("try accept with timeout = nowait - expect select when"
12014:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12015:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12016:        [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12017:     {select, {select_info, _, Handle}} = socket:accept(LSock, nowait),
12018:     ?P("expected select result: "
12019:        "~n   Select Handle:     ~p"
12020:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12021:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12022:        [Handle, socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12023: 
12024:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12025: 
12026:     %% perform a blocking accept that will fail (timeout)
12027:     ?P("attempt accept with timeout = 500 - expect failure (timeout)"),
12028:     {error, timeout} = socket:accept(LSock, 500),
12029: 
12030:     ?P("await abort message for the first accept call: "
12031:        "~n   Select Handle:     ~p"
12032:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12033:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p",
12034:        [Handle, socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12035:     receive
12036:         {'$socket', LSock, abort, {Handle, cancelled}} ->
12037:             ?P("received expected abort message"),
12038:             ok
12039:     end,
12040: 
12041:     %% spawn a client to connect
12042:     ?P("spawn connector when"
12043:        "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
12044:        "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
12045:        "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
12046:        [socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
12047:     {Connector, MRef} =
12048:         spawn_monitor(
12049:           fun() ->
12050:                   ?P("[connector] try create socket"),
12051:                   {ok, CSock} = socket:open(inet, stream),
12052:                   ?P("[connector] try connect: "
12053:                        "~n   (server) ~p", [SA]),
12054:                   ok = socket:connect(CSock, SA),
12055:                   ?P("[connector] connected - inform parent"),
12056:                   Parent ! {self(), connected},
12057:                   ?P("[connector] await termination command"),
12058:                   receive
12059:                       {Parent, terminate} ->
12060:                           ?P("[connector] terminate - close socket"),
12061:                           (catch socket:close(CSock)),
12062:                           exit(normal)
12063:                   end
12064:               end),
12065: 
12066:     ?P("await (connection-) confirmation from connector (~p)", [Connector]),
12067:     receive
12068:         {Connector, connected} ->
12069:             ?P("connector connected"),
12070:             ok
12071:     end,
12072: 
12073:     %% We should *not* get *any* select messages;
12074:     %% since the second call (that *replaced* the current active request)
12075:     %% timeout out
12076:     ?P("wait for a select message that should never come"),
12077:     Result =
12078:         receive
12079:             {'$socket', LSock, select, AnyHandle} ->
12080:                 ?P("received unexpected select message when"
12081:                    "~n   Unexpected Handle:  ~p"
12082:                    "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
12083:                    "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
12084:                    "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
12085:                    [AnyHandle,
12086:                     socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
12087:                 error
12088:         after 5000 ->
12089:                 ?P("expected timeout"),
12090:                 ok
12091:         end,
12092: 
12093:     ?P("try accept the waiting connection when"
12094:        "~n   (gen socket) info:  ~p"
12095:        "~n   Listen Socket info: ~p"
12096:        "~n   Sockets:            ~p",
12097:        [socket:info(), socket:info(LSock), socket:which_sockets()]),
12098: 
12099:     {ok, ASock} = socket:accept(LSock),
12100: 
12101:     ?P("connection accepted"
12102:        "~n   (gen socket) info:    ~p"
12103:        "~n   Accepted socket:      ~p"
12104:        "~n   Accepted Socket info: ~p"
12105:        "~n   Listen Socket info:   ~p"
12106:        "~n   Sockets:              ~p",
12107:        [socket:info(),
12108:         ASock,
12109:         socket:info(ASock),
12110:         socket:info(LSock),
12111:         socket:which_sockets()]),
12112: 
12113:     ?P("cleanup"),
12114:     socket:close(LSock),
12115:     socket:close(ASock),
12116:     Connector ! {self(), terminate},
12117:     receive
12118:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Connector, _} ->
12119:             ?P("connector terminated"),
12120:             ok
12121:     end,
12122: 
12123:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12124: 
12125:     ?P("done when"
12126:        "~n   (gen socket) info: ~p"
12127:        "~n   Sockets:           ~p", [socket:info(), socket:which_sockets()]),
12128: 
12129:     Result.
12130:

12133: 
12134: %% This test case is to verify recv on UDP with timeout zero (0) on Windows.
12135: otp19063(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
12136:     ?TT(?SECS(10)),
12137:     tc_try(?FUNCTION_NAME,
12138:            fun() ->
12139:                    %% is_windows(),
12140:                    has_support_ipv4()
12141:            end,
12142:            fun() ->
12143:                    InitState = #{},
12144:                    ok = do_otp19063(InitState)
12145:            end).
12146: 
12147: 
12148: do_otp19063(_) ->
12149:     Parent = self(),
12150: 
12151:     ?P("Get \"proper\" local socket address"),
12152:     LSA0 = which_local_socket_addr(inet),
12153:     LSA  = LSA0#{port => 0},
12154:     
12155: 
12156: 
12157:     %% --- recv ---
12158: 
12159:     ?P("[recv] - create (listen) socket"),
12160:     {ok, LSock1} = socket:open(inet, stream),
12161: 
12162:     ?P("[recv] bind (listen) socket to: "
12163:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12164:     ok = socket:bind(LSock1, LSA),
12165: 
12166:     ?P("[recv] make listen socket"),
12167:     ok = socket:listen(LSock1),
12168: 
12169:     ?P("[recv] get sockname for listen socket"),
12170:     {ok, SA1} = socket:sockname(LSock1),
12171: 
12172:     ?P("[recv] attempt a nowait-accept"),
12173:     {Tag, Handle} =
12174:         case socket:accept(LSock1, nowait) of
12175:             {select, {select_info, _, SH}} ->
12176:                 {select, SH};
12177:             {completion, {completion_info, _, CH}} ->
12178:                 {completion, CH}
12179:         end,
12180: 
12181:     ?P("[recv] spawn the connector process"),
12182:     {Connector, MRef} =
12183:         spawn_monitor(
12184:           fun() ->
12185:                   ?P("[connector] try create socket"),
12186:                   {ok, CSock1} = socket:open(inet, stream),
12187:                   ?P("[connector] bind socket to: "
12188:                      "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12189:                   ok = socket:bind(CSock1, LSA),
12190:                   ?P("[connector] try connect: "
12191:                      "~n   (server) ~p", [SA1]),
12192:                   ok = socket:connect(CSock1, SA1),
12193:                   ?P("[connector] connected - inform parent"),
12194:                   Parent ! {self(), connected},
12195:                   ?P("[connector] await termination command"),
12196:                   receive
12197:                       {Parent, terminate} ->
12198:                           ?P("[connector] terminate - close socket"),
12199:                           (catch socket:close(CSock1)),
12200:                           exit(normal)
12201:                   end
12202:           end),
12203: 
12204:     ?P("[recv] await (connection-) confirmation from connector (~p)",
12205:        [Connector]),
12206:     receive
12207:         {Connector, connected} ->
12208:             ?P("[recv] connector connected"),
12209:             ok
12210:     end,
12211: 
12212:     ?P("[recv] receive the accepted socket"),
12213:     ASock1 =
12214:         receive
12215:             {'$socket', LSock1, completion, {Handle, {ok, AS}}}
12216:               when (Tag =:= completion) ->
12217:                 AS;
12218:             {'$socket', LSock1, completion, {Handle, {error, Reason1C}}}
12219:               when (Tag =:= completion) ->
12220:                 exit({accept_failed, Reason1C});
12221:            {'$socket', LSock1, select, Handle}  ->
12222:                 case socket:accept(LSock1, nowait) of
12223:                     {ok, AS} ->
12224:                         AS;
12225:                     {error, Reason1S} ->
12226:                         exit({accept_failed, Reason1S})
12227:                 end
12228:         end,
12229: 
12230:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12231: 
12232:     ?P("[recv] try read"),
12233:     case socket:recv(ASock1, 0, 0) of
12234:         {error, timeout} ->
12235:             ok;
12236:         Any1             ->
12237:             ?P("Unexpected result: ~p", [Any1]),
12238:             exit({unexpected_recv_result, Any1})
12239:     end,
12240: 
12241: 
12242:     %% --- recvfrom ---
12243: 
12244:     ?P("[recvfrom} create socket"),
12245:     {ok, Sock2} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
12246: 
12247:     ?P("[recvfrom} bind socket to: "
12248:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12249:     ok = socket:bind(Sock2, LSA),
12250: 
12251:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12252: 
12253:     ?P("[recvfrom] try read"),
12254:     {error, timeout} = socket:recvfrom(Sock2, 1024, 0),
12255: 
12256: 
12257:     %% --- recvmsg ---
12258: 
12259:     ?P("[recvmsg] create socket"),
12260:     {ok, Sock3} = socket:open(inet, dgram),
12261: 
12262:     ?P("[recvmsg] bind socket to: "
12263:        "~n   ~p", [LSA]),
12264:     ok = socket:bind(Sock3, LSA),
12265: 
12266:     ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
12267: 
12268:     ?P("[recvmsg] try read"),
12269:     {error, timeout} = socket:recvmsg(Sock3, 0),
12270: 
12271: 
12272:     ?P("cleanup"),
12273: 
12274:     Connector ! {self(), terminate},
12275:     receive
12276:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Connector, _} ->
12277:             ?P("connector terminated"),
12278:             ok
12279:     end,
12280:     _ = socket:close(ASock1),
12281:     _ = socket:close(LSock1),
12282:     _ = socket:close(Sock2),
12283:     _ = socket:close(Sock3),
12284: 
12285:     ?P("done"),
12286: 
12287:     ok.
12288: 
12289: 
12290: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12291: 
12292: sock_open(Domain, Type, Proto) ->
12293:     try socket:open(Domain, Type, Proto) of
12294:         {ok, Socket} ->
12295:             Socket;
12296:         {error, Reason} ->
12297:             ?FAIL({open, Reason})
12298:     catch
12299:         C:E:S ->
12300:             ?FAIL({open, C, E, S})
12301:     end.
12302: 
12303: 
12304: sock_bind(Sock, LSA) ->
12305:     try socket:bind(Sock, LSA) of
12306:         ok = OK ->
12307:             OK;
12308:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
12309:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Address not available"),
12310:             throw({skip, Reason});
12311:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
12312:             ERROR
12313:     catch
12314:         C:E:S ->
12315:             ?FAIL({bind, C, E, S})
12316:     end.
12317: 
12318: %% sock_connect(Sock, SockAddr) ->
12319: %%     try socket:connect(Sock, SockAddr) of
12320: %%         ok ->
12321: %%             ok;
12322: %%         {error, Reason} ->
12323: %%             ?FAIL({connect, Reason})
12324: %%     catch
12325: %%         C:E:S ->
12326: %%             ?FAIL({connect, C, E, S})
12327: %%     end.
12328:     
12329: sock_port(S) ->
12330:     case socket:sockname(S) of
12331:         {ok, #{port := Port}} -> Port;
12332:         {ok, #{}}             -> undefined
12333:     end.
12334: 
12335: %% sock_sockname(Sock) ->
12336: %%     try socket:sockname(Sock) of
12337: %%         {ok, SockAddr} ->
12338: %%             SockAddr;
12339: %%         {error, Reason} ->
12340: %%             ?FAIL({sockname, Reason})
12341: %%     catch
12342: %%         C:E:S ->
12343: %%             ?FAIL({sockname, C, E, S})
12344: %%     end.
12345:     
12346: sock_close(Sock) ->
12347:     try socket:close(Sock) of
12348:         ok ->
12349:             ok;
12350:         {error, Reason} ->
12351:             i("sock_close -> error: ~p", [Reason]),
12352:             ?FAIL({close, Reason})
12353:     catch
12354:         C:E:S ->
12355:             i("sock_close -> failed: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C, E, S]),
12356:             ?FAIL({close, C, E, S})
12357:     end.
12358:

12362: local_host() ->
12363:     try net_adm:localhost() of
12364:         Host when is_list(Host) ->
12365: 	    %% Convert to shortname if long
12366: 	    case string:tokens(Host, [$.]) of
12367: 		[H|_] ->
12368: 		    list_to_atom(H)
12369: 	    end
12370:     catch
12371:         C:E:S ->
12372:             erlang:raise(C, E, S)
12373:     end.
12374:

12376: %% The point of this is to "ensure" that paths from different test runs
12377: %% don't clash.
12378: 
12379: mk_unique_path() ->
12380:     ?SLIB:mk_unique_path().
12381: 
12382: 
12383: which_local_socket_addr(local = Domain) ->
12384:     #{family => Domain,
12385:       path   => mk_unique_path()};
12386: 
12387: %% This gets the local socket address (not 127.0...)
12388: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
12389: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
12390: which_local_socket_addr(Domain) ->
12391:     case ?KLIB:which_local_host_info(Domain) of
12392:         {ok, [#{addr := Addr}|_]} ->
12393:             #{family => Domain,
12394:               addr   => Addr};
12395:         {error, Reason} ->
12396:             ?FAIL(Reason)
12397:     end.
12398: 
12399: 
12400: which_local_addr(local = _Domain) ->
12401:     mk_unique_path();
12402: 
12403: %% This gets the local address (not 127.0...)
12404: %% We should really implement this using the (new) net module,
12405: %% but until that gets the necessary functionality...
12406: which_local_addr(Domain) ->
12407:     ?KLIB:which_local_addr(Domain).

12439:         _ ->

12441:     end.

12455:             skip("Not supported");
12456:         {unix, netbsd} ->
12457:             %% XXX We will have to investigate this later...
12458:             skip("Not supported");
12459:         _ ->
12460:             case socket:is_supported(sctp) of
12461:                 true ->
12462:                     ok;
12463:                 false ->
12464:                     skip("Not supported")
12465:             end

12567: unlink_path(Path) ->
12568:     unlink_path(Path, fun() -> ok end, fun() -> ok end).
12569: 
12570: unlink_path(Path, Success, Failure)
12571:   when is_function(Success, 0), is_function(Failure, 0) ->
12572:     case Path of
12573:         undefined ->
12574:             ?SEV_IPRINT("not a path to unlink"),
12575:                     Success();
12576:         _ ->
12577:             ?SEV_IPRINT("try unlink path: "
12578:                         "~n   ~s", [Path]),
12579:             case file:delete(Path) of
12580:                 ok ->
12581:                     ?SEV_IPRINT("path unlinked: "
12582:                                 "~n   Path: ~s", [Path]),
12583:                     Success();
12584:                 Error ->
12585:                     ?SEV_EPRINT("unlink failed: "
12586:                                 "~n   Path: ~s"
12587:                                 "~n   Res:  ~p", [Path, Error]),
12588:                     Failure()
12589:             end
12590:     end.

12606: 
12607: %% *** tc_try/2,3 ***
12608: %% Case:      Basically the test case name
12609: %% TCCondFun: A fun that is evaluated before the actual test case
12610: %%            The point of this is that it can performs checks to
12611: %%            see if we shall run the test case at all.
12612: %%            For instance, the test case may only work in specific
12613: %%            conditions.
12614: %% FCFun:     The test case fun
12615: tc_try(Case, TCFun) ->
12616:     ?TC_TRY(Case, TCFun).
12617: 
12618: tc_try(Case, TCCondFun, TCFun) ->
12619:     ?TC_TRY(Case, TCCondFun, TCFun).
12620:    
12621: 
12622: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
12623: 
12624: start_node(Name) ->
12625:     start_node(Name, 5000).
12626: 
12627: start_node(Name, Timeout) when is_integer(Timeout) andalso (Timeout > 0) ->
12628:     try ?CT_PEER(#{name => Name, wait_boot => Timeout}) of
12629:         {ok, Peer, Node} ->
12630:             ?SEV_IPRINT("Started node ~p", [Name]),
12631:             {Peer, Node};
12632:         {error, Reason} ->
12633:             ?SEV_EPRINT("failed starting node ~p (=> SKIP):"
12634:                         "~n   ~p", [Name, Reason]),
12635:             skip(Reason)
12636:     catch
12637:         Class:Reason:Stack ->
12638:             ?SEV_EPRINT("Failed starting node: "
12639:                         "~n   Class:  ~p"
12640:                         "~n   Reason: ~p"
12641:                         "~n   Stack:  ~p",
12642:                         [Class, Reason, Stack]),
12643:             skip({node_start, Class, Reason})
12644:     end.
12645:

12648: 
12649: i(F) ->
12650:     i(F, []).
12651: 
12652: i(F, A) ->
12653:     FStr = ?F("[~s] " ++ F, [?FTS()|A]),
12654:     io:format(user, FStr ++ "~n", []),
12655:     io:format(FStr, []).
12656:
